name: Lost Sanctity
description:
Explore The Great Temple of Midore Valley in a procedurally generated side-scroller as a righteous knight on a mission. Fight dangerous creatures as you seek to halt the magical upheaval that has befallen the once sacred temple, and cleanse the abominations within. Uncover mysteries and adapt to an ever-changing, unforgiving dungeon. Your resolve will be tested!

The path to salvation is hidden, and will change alongside the dungeon.

Piece together bits of journal-entries to grasp the nature of this world, and uncover secrets that will prepare your mind for what lies ahead. Aquire weapons to fight accordingly as every enemy will respond with either dissatifaction or agonizing pain. 

Do not dispair. Help is to be found, but not for free. The merchants will charge you with gold, and the dungeon will charge you with 10 years of confessions. 

Forge ahead and vanquish the evil that inhabits the temple. From the noble and bright Towers of Wisdom, to the dark depth of the Caves. 

Vile creatures await you in the Lost Sanctity
